name: @ton-business/contracts
description: TON smart contracts for TON Business Suite

scripts.build:all: npm run build:loyalty-token && npm run build:payment-escrow && npm run build:tip-transfer && npm run build:cross-merchant
scripts.deploy:testnet: npm run build:all && ton-cli deploy dist/loyalty-token.boc --testnet
scripts.deploy:mainnet: npm run build:all && ton-cli deploy dist/loyalty-token.boc --mainnet
scripts.verify:contracts: npm run build:all && npm run test
